author: m.kalinin
content: I am not sure that this would be the right thing to do. Could you please expand more on the use case? We will have authentication for Engine API but it's going to protect EL client from accidentally following incorrect directions from unauthenticated source in the case when the endpoint is accessible from internet. (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/162)

author: thegostep
content: The idea is for the validators to be able to inform the block builders of the state of the chain they want to build on - this is accessible from the network side, but am wondering if there are optimizations to be had from communicating it directly
